snippet.title: K-Razy Antiks for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

Commodore VIC-20


Game description:

Floods, predators, and Enemy Ants threaten the White Anthill. Its survival is in your hands!
Bent on the total extermination of the White Ants, hostile Enemy Ants are invading your Anthill. Programmed to search and destroy, they are relentless in their pursuit. Your mission- rid the Anthill of Enemy Ants before they destroy you. Deposit White Eggs safely in the maze of tunnels— they are your only guarantee of survival. Destroy Enemy Eggs and lure the attackers into the deadly flood waters or into the path of the dreaded Anteater's tongue. But beware! Only the most clever can outwit and outlast the enemy.


What I think:

K-Razy Antiks has a really, really interesting concept, but the gameplay itself is "okay"...
